assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Route Mobile Limited provides cloud-communication platform services to enterprises, over-the-top players, and mobile network operators in Africa, the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, and North America. It offers messaging, voice, and email, as well as short messaging service (SMS) filtering, analytics, and monetization; and firewall, SMS hubbing, and instant virtual number solutions. The company provides its cloud-communication services to clients in the social media, banking and financial services, aviation, retail, Internet/e-commerce, logistics, healthcare, hospitality, media and entertainment, pharmaceuticals, and telecom sectors. Route Mobile Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Rajdip Kumar Chandrakant Gupta
companyOfficers.title: Co-Founder, MD, Group CEO & Exec. Director

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Rathindra  Das
companyOfficers.title: Head of Legal, Company Sec. & Compliance Officer

companyOfficers.title: Assistant Company Sec. & Investor Relations Officer
